thread.title: Bigg Boss introduces a brand new Double Trouble room on Day 12
thread.title_full: Bigg Boss introduces a brand new Double Trouble room on Day 12 - Entertainment

author: A Corespondent
title: Bigg Boss introduces a brand new Double Trouble room on Day 12
text:
In today's episode on 'Bigg Boss 9', the contestants are in for a surprise as Bigg Boss introduces the Double Trouble room.
Also read:  'Bigg Boss 9' - Keith Sequeira's ex-wife Samyukta Singh to enter the house 

Kishwer and Aman inside 'Bigg Boss 9' Double Trouble room 
Encashing on the theme this season, Bigg Boss brings all the contestants together to announce about the new Double Trouble room which consists of two sound proof booths.
Two contestants will get called into this room every week and they will be asked one question by Bigg Boss. They answer the question by pressing a buzzer present in front of them and their decisions will change the game at every turn. Both contestants will plug in headphones and will not be aware of whether the other contestant has pressed the buzzer or not.
Also read:  Bigg Boss 9 Day 11 - Aman and Kishwer 'fight' for captaincy task 
Aman and Kishwer are the first two contestants chosen for this task. Aman and Kishwer were called into the Double Trouble room and Bigg Boss tells them that they have the power to free the rest of the house but on these three conditions:
a) If one of them presses the buzzer, the whole house gets free of the bond
b) If both press the buzzer, Aman and Kishwer get tied up again
c) If none of them press the buzzer, they will get back into a bond along with another jodi but the rest of the house will be freed of the bond

Watch: 'Bigg Boss 9' Day 12: Bigg Boss introduces 'selfie beauty easy' task
